scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run compile && nyc tap --no-timeout ./build/test/*.test.js
scripts.clean: bcx before-clean && rm -fr build css; cd electronMain; npm run clean && bcx after-clean
scripts.compile: c=`pwd`; bcx before-compile && tsc; sass src/scss:css; cd $c; bcx after-compile
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: bcx before-bundle && webpack -c --mode development && bcx after-bundle
scripts.clean build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean run desktop: npm run clean; npm run "run desktop"
scripts.run electron: c=`pwd`; bcx before-launch && cd electronMain && npm run start && cd $c; bcx after-launch
scripts.run desktop: npm run build && npm run bundle && npm run "run electron"
scripts.build android: npm run compile && bcx before-mobile && cd NativeScript/ThunderBolt-NS && tns build android
scripts.run android: npm run compile && bcx before-mobile && cd NativeScript/ThunderBolt-NS && tns run android --device=medium
scripts.debug android: npm run compile && bcx before-mobile  && cd NativeScript/ThunderBolt-NS && tns debug android --debug-brk --device=medium
